name: LINJER
1stGood: Minimalistic caption to compliment the brand's core values.
2ndGood: The blog post serves as a great way to spark new interest from potential customers who have shown signs of interest without yet purchasing.
3rdGood: Using Business Insider, which objectively is a well-known brand, they can increase the potential customers trust in their own company.
1stBad: One could debate that the ad is dull and not captivating enough.
2ndBad: The previous statement would be even more true if the ad is served to an audience who has not yet engaged with the brand in any way.
